cards.description: Discard 1 random card from your opponentâ€™s hand.
Discard 1 card then shuffle 1 Equipment on the field into the deck.
Discard any number of Equipment cards of the same element then deal damage to a Champion equal to the number of Equipment discarded X 10.
Deal 10 damage to a Champion or if that Champion was healed during your opponents last turn: deal 30 damage instead.
If an Equipment equipped to one of your Champions was destroyed during your opponents last turn: add that Equipment from your Grave to your Hand.
